title: A major Issue of 'clarity' in game
body:
Riot has told us that their goal is in game clarity, so i would really like the Death Recap thing fixed so it is CLEAR what actually does the damage  so we can adjust our builds accordingly.

the screenshot below shows 2 death recap screens, the first is on aram where apparently no one killed me but Miss fortune got an assist using Azir's Q
the second is on summoners rift where apparently i lost 1583 hp yet only 614 damage came from yasuo, quinn and lee,
the majority of the damage came from somewhere else but because i have no idea what did it i don't know to build magic resist, hp or armour 
this isn't clarity in my mind and I'm sure lots of people would appreciate it if it was clear and showed all the damage.

replies.body: All to often it says revive did a certain amount of magic damage in death recap.{{summoner:10}}
Yea, someone told me that its sunfire cape that does that, but thats just confusing either way.
the first one is so obviously a bug though.

Riot has commented previously on issues with the death recap, it is something they are looking into however at the moment other things take precedence. It can be difficult trying to itemise against un-registered damage.
